entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
